projects.name: FACE RECOGNITION BASED SMART ATTENDANCE SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed and implemented machine learning models utilizing OpenCV and k-NN clustering. This project takes attendance based on face recognition. In this project, preprocessing was required.

projects.name: Plant Disease Detection using CNN
projects.description: Employed convolutional neural networks (CNNs) including VGG16, ResNet50, and EfficientNetV2, with EfficientNetV2 achieving an overall accuracy of 96.06%.

projects.name: Crop Recommendation using ML
projects.description: Developed a crop recommendation system achieving an accuracy of 99.31% using the Random Forest algorithm. Implemented and compared three different machine learning algorithms - Decision Tree, Multi-Layer Perceptron, and Random Forest.

experiences.description: Three-month research project: Worked on developing a machine learning model to predict future prices of vegetables. The project involved collecting and analyzing data from various sources, including market trends and historical price data, to build a predictive model. Utilized techniques such as data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model training to achieve accurate predictions, aiding farmers and vendors in making informed decisions.
Gained hands-on experience with various AWS services, including EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda, through comprehensive training and practical applications.

full_output.name: GOPISETTI PAVAN
achievements_and_awards: Ranked 5th in Anakapalle city in Intermediate Results.
Qualified among the top 15 out of 900 students in JEE Main at Sri Chaitanya College with an Rank 49334.
Presented at Viksit Bharat Ideathon and received a certificate.
